SEARCH
Package entity

Class HDBOfficer

java.lang.Object
entity.User
entity.Applicant
entity.HDBOfficer
public class HDBOfficer extends Applicant
The HDBOfficer class represents HDB staff who handle flat booking for successful applicants.

HDB Officers extend the Applicant class (which extends User) with additional functionality:

  • Officers can be assigned to specific BTO projects
  • They require registration approval from HDB Managers
  • They process successful applications by helping applicants book flats
  • They generate receipts for booked applications

Officers cannot be assigned to multiple projects with overlapping application periods, and they cannot register for a project they've applied for as an applicant.

  • Constructor Details

    • HDBOfficer

      public HDBOfficer(String nric, String password, int age, MaritalStatus maritalStatus, String name)
      Constructs a new HDBOfficer with the specified attributes.

      New officers start with no assigned project and their registration is not approved.

      Parameters:
      nric - The officer's NRIC (unique identifier)
      password - The officer's password
      age - The officer's age in years
      maritalStatus - The officer's marital status
      name - The officer's full name

  • Method Details

    • getAssignedProject

      public BTOProject getAssignedProject()
      Gets the BTO project this officer is assigned to.
      Returns:
      The assigned project, or null if not assigned to any project

    • setAssignedProject

      public void setAssignedProject(BTOProject project)
      Assigns this officer to a BTO project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to assign the officer to, or null to unassign

    • isRegistrationApproved

      public boolean isRegistrationApproved()
      Checks if this officer's registration has been approved by an HDB Manager.
      Returns:
      true if the registration is approved, false otherwise

    • setRegistrationApproved

      public void setRegistrationApproved(boolean approved)
      Sets the approval status of this officer's registration.
      Parameters:
      approved - true to approve the registration, false to reject or revoke approval

    • canRegisterForProject

      public boolean canRegisterForProject(BTOProject project)
      Determines if this officer can register for a specific BTO project.

      An officer cannot register for a project if:

      • They are already assigned to another project
      • They have applied for this project as an applicant
      • They are assigned to another project with an overlapping application period
      Parameters:
      project - The project to check registration eligibility for
      Returns:
      true if the officer can register for this project, false otherwise

    • getApplications

      public List<BTOApplication> getApplications()
      Gets a list of applications for the project this officer is assigned to.
      Returns:
      List of applications for the assigned project, or an empty list if not assigned

    • canGenerateReceipt

      public boolean canGenerateReceipt(BTOApplication application)
      Determines if a receipt can be generated for a specific application.

      Receipts can only be generated for applications with BOOKED status that are not requesting withdrawal.

      Parameters:
      application - The application to check
      Returns:
      true if a receipt can be generated, false otherwise

    • getUserType

      public UserType getUserType()
      Gets the user type of this officer.

      Overrides the getUserType method from the User class through Applicant to ensure the correct user type is returned.

      Overrides:
      getUserType in class User
      Returns:
      UserType.HDB_OFFICER
